channel.title: [2006Remade] Looking for a content developer
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2hrzm1g.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
Base is Runesource/Azure
2006Remade is currently looking for 1-2 more content developers. For some information about 2006Remade, click [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/advertise/502470-2006remade-1-2006-replica.html"]here[/URL]. If you want to apply for the position, please reply using the format below.
[CODE] 1. Name: 2. Age: 3. Time Zone: 4. How long have you been working with Java: 5. How active can you be: 6. Are you currently working on anything, if so what: 7. Past work: 8. Skype: [/CODE]

item.title: [2006Remade] Looking for a content developer
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Jay Sir Jay
item.description:
@Sir_Jay wrote:

  1. Name: Jason

  2. Age: 18

  3. Time Zone: GMT

  4. How long have you been working with Java: I’ve been a part of the community since 2006, registered in 2007 and I am at University currently studying computer science. I have been working with Java consistently and seriously for about 6 months now.

  5. How active can you be: Other than when I’m at University I will be available.

  6. Are you currently working on anything, if so what: If you’re talking RSPS wise then no, I haven’t worked on an RSPS in years but I fell in love with the idea of this project. I am working on a portfolio in website form though if you mean in general.

  7. Past work: Like I said, I haven’t worked on a private server in years and even so they were so crap compared to my knowledge today, I don’t have them documented, saved or anything.

  8. Skype: j__a__y1

Overall, I may not be the most knowledgeable in terms of developing a Runescape Private Server, but I absolutely love the idea of the project, I know the fundamentals of OOP and Java itself and I am willing to put the time and effort in to learn.

Read full topic

item.title: [2006Remade] Looking for a content developer
item.dc:creator: @lotlot56 lotlot56
item.description:
@lotlot56 wrote:

  1. Name: Cole Hooker
  2. Age: 17
  3. Time Zone: pst
  4. How long have you been working with Java: i started on my first server in 2009 later moving to Minecraft plugins and now i’m back to rs. So 4 years.
  5. How active can you be: I am on the computer 4-6 hours a day.
  6. Are you currently working on anything, if so what: I am currently working on a matrix source, whenever i get bored i will work on it to pass time.
  7. Past work: use to code for 2speced not that anyone remembers that server and I’ve owned at least 5 servers. at the peak of my best server we had about 35 active at all times. was also apart of rooneyscape dev team.
  8. Skype: colehooker@msn.com

Read full topic

item.title: [2006Remade] Looking for a content developer
item.dc:creator: @south-park south-park
item.description:
@south-park wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:5, topic:535308”]1. Name: Jason Rivera
2. Age: 15 (turning 16 in two weeks :))
3. Time Zone: Eastern
4. How long have you been working with Java: Almost 4 years now
5. How active can you be: I’ll be on and ready to work at least 5 times a week.
6. Are you currently working on anything, if so what: Asteria. I’m taking my time with it.
7. Past work: Ademia, 317beta, Adonia, and currently Asteria. I also have many tutorials throughout the forums and can show you more advanced work in private.
8. Skype: lare96.rsps[/quote]
Added.

Read full topic
